events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking info hasn't been updated for days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay due to the reported late shipment and tracking concerns.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent who will assist you with your delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order has not arrived and Iâ€™m here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into the delay further?
Sure, my order number is 568932, and the last tracking status was 'shipment processed' 5 days ago with no updates since.
Thanks for the details. I've contacted the carrier and requested an urgent update. Meanwhile, I will also expedite the shipping on our end.
I appreciate your prompt response and the effort to speed up the delivery. Looking forward to receiving more updates soon.
Your package has now been delivered as of this morning. Please confirm receipt or let us know if there are any further issues.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back and your order was confirmed delivered, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
